pages.text: "A machine that uses the process of electrolysis to split apart a certain gas into two different gases" $(p)The Electrolytic Separator (ES) takes in a substance, and forms 2 new chemicals. For example, if you were to input water into an Electrolytic Separator, you would get Hydrogen and Oxygen.

$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_energy)Energy Upgrades$(/l) (8) (Note that Energy Upgrades will not reduce power consumption for the ES, they will only increase power capacity)$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_muffling)Muffling Upgrades$(/l) (4)
